title: K/DA - POP/STARS (ft. Madison Beer, (G)I-DLE, Jaira Burns) | Music Video - League of Legends
about: The explosive debut of K/DA, Riot's virtual K-pop supergroup featuring Ahri, Evelynn, Kai'Sa, and Akali. Blending bilingual pop hooks with fierce attitude, Madison Beer and Jaira Burns join (G)I-DLE's Soyeon and Miyeon for a genre-smashing anthem that debuted at Worlds 2018, shattering records and igniting a pop culture revolution.

title: Warriors (ft. Imagine Dragons) | Worlds 2014 - League of Legends
about: The groundbreaking anthem that launched League's Worlds music tradition. Imagine Dragons' arena-rock powerhouse, with sweeping visuals of champions rallying for battle, captured the raw thrill of the 2014 Championship in Seoul—setting the stage for esports anthems to conquer the world.

title: RISE (ft. The Glitch Mob, Mako, and The Word Alive) | Worlds 2018 - League of Legends
artist: The Glitch Mob, Mako, The Word Alive
about: A pulse-pounding fusion of electronic drops and metal screams, chronicling a pro player's grueling ascent to Worlds glory. The Glitch Mob, Mako, and The Word Alive craft an anthem of unyielding ambition that fueled the 2018 Championship's underdog triumphs.

title: Legends Never Die (ft. Against The Current) | Worlds 2017 - League of Legends
about: Chrissy Costanza's soaring vocals deliver a timeless ode to resilience and legacy, tracing a summoner's epic quest from novice to champion. Performed live at Beijing's Bird's Nest, this emotional powerhouse defined Worlds 2017's spirit of eternal perseverance.

title: K/DA - MORE ft. Madison Beer, (G)I-DLE, Lexie Liu, Jaira Burns, Seraphine (Official Music Video)
artist: K/DA, Madison Beer, (G)I-DLE, Lexie Liu, Jaira Burns, Seraphine
about: K/DA's explosive comeback expands the squad with Seraphine (voiced by Lexie Liu), unleashing a bold, bass-heavy pop odyssey of ambition and excess. Debuting at Worlds 2020 in Shanghai, it fused virtual idols with real-world spectacle, demanding the spotlight—and getting it.

title: True Damage - GIANTS (ft. Becky G, Keke Palmer, SOYEON, DUCKWRTH, Thutmose) | League of Legends
artist: Becky G, Keke Palmer, SOYEON, DUCKWRTH, Thutmose
about: Riot's hip-hop powerhouse True Damage—Qiyana, Ekko, Akali, Yasuo, and Senna—drops a swaggering, genre-blending trap opus with Becky G, Keke Palmer, SOYEON, Duckwrth, and Thutmose. Live-debuted with holograms at Worlds 2019 in Paris, it fused street cred with Runeterra flair.

title: Welcome to Noxus - Bite Marks (ft. TEYA) | 2025 Season 1 Cinematic - League of Legends
about: Fortiche's blood-drenched masterpiece ushers in 2025 with Noxus' savage conquests. TEYA's seductive snarls underscore Briar, Swain, and Ambessa Medarda's ruthless empire-building, teasing a season of unrelenting war and Fortiche's Arcane-adjacent visuals.

title: Phoenix (ft. Cailin Russo and Chrissy Costanza) | Worlds 2019 - League of Legends
about: Chrissy Costanza reunites with Cailin Russo for a blistering rebirth anthem, igniting the flames of Worlds 2019's underdog battles. From ashes to victory, it embodies the unquenchable drive that propelled G2 to glory in Europe.

title: Warriors | Season 2020 Cinematic - League of Legends (ft. 2WEI and Edda Hayes)
notes: Remix of the original Warriors anthem
about: An orchestral evolution of Imagine Dragons' 2014 classic, this remix ignites Sylas' Demacian rebellion in a symphony of defiance and revolution. Blur Studio's hyper-detailed CG elevates the season's lore clashes to breathtaking heights.

title: The Call | Season 2022 Cinematic - League of Legends (ft. 2WEI, Louis Leibfried, and Edda Hayes)
about: Unit Image's frost-ravaged epic summons ancient Freljord warriors—Anivia, Ornn, Sejuani—for a desperate stand against apocalypse. 2WEI and Edda Hayes' haunting choir evokes the chill of finality in this prelude to Season 2022's world-ending saga.

title: Get Jinxed (ft. Djerv) | Official Music Video - League of Legends
about: Agnete Kjølsrud's maniacal wail unleashes Jinx's chaotic origin in a punk-metal frenzy of explosions and anarchy. This 2013 launch anthem, now amplified by Arcane's undercity mayhem, cements the Loose Cannon as League's ultimate agent of delightful destruction.

title: Still Here | Season 2024 Cinematic - League of Legends (ft. Forts, Tiffany Aris, and 2WEI)
about: Unit Image's time-bending elegy follows Kindred's inexorable hunt across eras—from Kayle and Morgana's ancient clash to Tryndamere's defiant roar against death. Forts and Tiffany Aris' layered vocals weave a tapestry of mortality, redefining Season 2024's theme of inevitable ends.

title: GODS ft. NewJeans (뉴진스) (Official Music Video) | Worlds 2023 Anthem - League of Legends
about: NewJeans' ethereal pop chronicles Deft's decade-long odyssey from high school dreamer to Worlds 2022 champion with DRX. Unveiled in Seoul for the homeland's triumphant return, this luminous track immortalizes the grind behind esports divinity.

title: Awaken | Season 2019 Cinematic - League of Legends (ft. Valerie Broussard)
about: Valerie Broussard's primal howl awakens chaos: Draven's brutal execution of Rakan ignites Ionian flames, while Sylas shatters Demacian chains. This viral juggernaut, blending high-stakes lore and jaw-dropping animation, heralded Season 2019's era of cinematic revolution.

title: K/DA - VILLAIN ft. Madison Beer and Kim Petras (Official Concept Video - Starring Evelynn)
about: Evelynn's serpentine solo slithers into the shadows with Madison Beer and Kim Petras' venomous hyperpop. A psychological descent into seductive villainy, this All Out highlight revels in the thrill of being unapologetically wicked.

title: Ignite (ft. Zedd) | Worlds 2016 - League of Legends
about: Zedd's thunderous EDM inferno erupts with iconic plays from the 2016 season, from clutch steals to Baron brawls. A high-octane tribute to the moments that set the Rift ablaze, it amplified Worlds' explosive energy.

title: Lil Nas X - STAR WALKIN' (League of Legends Worlds Anthem)
about: Lil Nas X morphs into the Summoner's Cup itself in this audacious, neon-drenched spectacle for Worlds 2022 in San Francisco. A bold fusion of trap swagger and cosmic flair, it struts the path to esports immortality with unfiltered charisma.

title: Take Over (ft. Jeremy McKinnon (A Day To Remember), MAX, Henry) | Worlds 2020 - League of Legends
about: A genre-defying maelstrom of metalcore roars, pop choruses, and orchestral swells, guiding young pros through Runeterra's realms to conquer past legends like Faker and Mata. Crafted for the pandemic's Shanghai bubble, it roared defiance against isolation.

title: Heavy Is The Crown ft. Linkin Park (Official Music Video) | League of Legends Worlds 2024 Anthem
about: Linkin Park's triumphant resurrection—Emily Armstrong's fierce vocals atop Mike Shinoda's riffs—crushes the burden of legacy in this nu-metal juggernaut. Animated siege on T1's castle foreshadows Worlds 2024's brutal quest for the crown.

title: You Really Got Me | Cinematic Trailer - League of Legends: Wild Rift (ft. 2WEI)
about: 2WEI's electrified Kinks cover blasts Wild Rift's mobile debut with chaotic brawls on Summoner's Rift. A high-energy portal to pocket-sized League mayhem, it hooked millions into the touch-screen revolution.

title: Twenty One Pilots - The Line (from Arcane Season 2) [Official Music Video]
channel: League of Legends, Twenty One Pilots
about: Tyler Joseph and Josh Dun's glitchy alt-rock unravels Jayce and Viktor's fracturing brotherhood in Arcane Season 2. A raw dissection of ambition's razor edge, it pulses with the heartbreak of genius torn asunder by hubris.

title: Burn It All Down (ft. PVRIS) | Worlds 2021 - League of Legends
about: Lynn Gunn's incendiary alt-rock scorches the Worlds 2021 opening, syncing with EDG's Shanghai sweep and Arcane's explosive premiere. A defiant blaze of global rivalries, it torched the stage for esports' most chaotic year.

title: Sacrifice ft. G.E.M. (鄧紫棋) (Official Music Video) | League of Legends Worlds 2025 Anthem
about: G.E.M.'s soaring Cantopop ballad honors 15 years of Worlds sacrifice, weaving pros' triumphs and tragedies—from Faker's dynasty to Shushei's tribute. A tearful chronicle of glory's hidden toll, it crowns Chengdu's 2025 epic.

title: HEARTSTEEL - PARANOIA ft. BAEKHYUN, tobi lou, ØZI, and Cal Scruby (Official Music Video)
artist: BAEKHYUN, tobi lou, ØZI, Cal Scruby
about: League's boyband HEARTSTEEL—Ezreal, Kayn, Aphelios, Yone, K'Sante, Sett—unleashes fame's toxic grip in this glossy electro-rap confessional. Baekhyun, tobi lou, ØZI, and Cal Scruby's verses dissect stardom's paranoia with razor-sharp hooks.

title: Pentakill: Mortal Reminder | Official Music Video - League of Legends
about: Pentakill's thunderous power metal summons undead legends—Karthus, Yorick, Sona, Olaf, Mordekaiser, Kayle—for a cataclysmic gig in the grave. Jørn Lande's operatic fury from Grasp of the Undying crushes with symphonic savagery.

title: As We Fall | Varus Music Video - League of Legends
about: A devastating animated requiem for lovers Kai and Val, ensnared by Darkin Varus in a vortex of vengeance and loss. This lore-redefining tragedy plunges into Ionian depths, birthing the Arrow of Retribution from shattered romance.

title: Fighter!! (ft. ASCA) | K.O. Coliseum OP | Set Cinematic - Teamfight Tactics
about: ASCA's blistering J-rock opener catapults TFT Set 15's K.O. Coliseum into a chibi-fueled fighting frenzy. Neon arenas erupt as pint-sized champs unleash superpowered haymakers, blending arcade nostalgia with Convergence chaos.

title: Stromae, Pomme - Ma Meilleure Ennemie (from Arcane Season 2) [Official Music Video]
about: Stromae and Pomme's bilingual lament entwines Caitlyn and Jinx's fractured sisterhood in Arcane Season 2's toxic tango. A French-English elegy of love's wreckage, it aches with the beauty of unbreakable, unbreakable bonds forged in betrayal.

title: REMIX RUMBLE ft. Steve Aoki (Official Music Video) | Teamfight Tactics
about: Steve Aoki remixes TFT Set 10 into a neon-fueled rave royale, where chibi DJs like Seraphine and K/DA Ahri spin lethal beats. Heartsteel and True Damage crash the party in this genre-mashing celebration of musical mayhem.

title: The Curse of the Sad Mummy | Amumu Music Video - League of Legends
shortTitle: The Curse of the Sad Mummy
about: A poignant animated fable of Shurima's eternal outcast, Amumu's quest for companionship twists into bandaged tragedy. This tear-soaked tale, blending whimsy and woe, immortalizes the Sad Mummy's curse of isolation.

title: Everything Goes On - Porter Robinson (Official Music Video) | Star Guardian 2022
about: Porter Robinson's indie-electronica heart-cry salutes Star Guardian's fading lights—Zoe, Jinx, Yuumi—against cosmic oblivion. A tender requiem for teenage saviors' fleeting blaze, it aches with love's fragile, universe-saving spark.

title: K/DA - I'LL SHOW YOU ft. TWICE, Bekuh BOOM, Annika Wells (Official Concept Video - Starring Ahri)
artist: K/DA, TWICE, Bekuh BOOM, Annika Wells
about: Ahri's defiant pop manifesto, laced with TWICE's Nayeon, Sana, Jihyo, and Chaeyoung, roars against self-doubt's cage. Bekuh Boom and Annika Wells amplify the Nine-Tailed Fox's rebirth, proving leadership blooms from inner fire.

title: Burning Bright | Star Guardian Music Video - League of Legends
about: The magical-girl genesis: Lux, Jinx, Poppy, and crew transform in a dazzling supernova assault on encroaching void. Allie Crystal's ethereal chorus ignites the original Star Guardian saga, where teen guardians blaze against universal darkness.

title: Light and Shadow (ft. Hiroyuki Sawano) | Star Guardian Animated Trailer - League of Legends
about: Hiroyuki Sawano's orchestral maelstrom plunges Zoe, Syndra, and fallen guardians into corrupted twilight. Gemie's anguished cry pierces the veil between light and shadow, unveiling Star Guardian's heartbreaking schism.

title: K/DA - DRUM GO DUM ft. Aluna, Wolftyla, Bekuh BOOM (Official Concept Video - Starring Bailey Sok)
about: Kai'Sa's percussive dancefloor domination pulses with Aluna, Wolftyla, and Bekuh Boom's global beats. Bailey Sok's choreography electrifies this All Out banger, channeling the Void-touched star's unbridled rhythm into hypnotic fury.

title: Here, Tomorrow (ft Lilas, Kevin Penkin) - Spirit Blossom Beyond '25 S2 Cinematic - League of Legends
about: Kevin Penkin's luminous strings and Lilas Ikuta's whisper-soft vocals bridge Spirit Blossom's realms of loss and renewal. Ashe's wandering queen haunts ethereal petals, promising rebirth beyond every fragile farewell.

title: Royal & the Serpent - Wasteland (from Arcane Season 2) [Official Music Video]
about: Royal & the Serpent's scorched-earth alt-rock howls the apocalypse of Arcane Season 1's fallout. A furious requiem for shattered undercities, it scorches the scars of shimmer and hextech's unholy union.

title: Blood Sweat & Tears ft. Sheryl Lee Ralph | Official Music Video - League of Legends
about: Broadway titan Sheryl Lee Ralph embodies Ambessa Medarda's wolfish ferocity in this regal war hymn. A visionary descent into Noxian savagery, it heralds the warlord's Arcane-fueled conquest with unyielding pride and primal hunger.

title: BREATHE | Official Launch Video - Legends of Runeterra
about: Fleurie's haunting folk whispers unveil Runeterra's fractured realms—from Demacia's spires to Zaun's underbelly. A mesmerizing launch odyssey, it inhales the world's wonders and exhales its infinite possibilities.

title: Tournament of Souls - Coming Alive (ft. Vo Williams, Boslen) | Soul Fighter Cinematic - Riot Games
about: Wizz and CRCR's 90s arcade throwback pits soul-staked gladiators in Samira's infernal bracket. Vo Williams and Boslen's hip-hop thunder pumps the adrenaline, where every knockout gambles eternity on the edge of oblivion.

title: Season 2019: A New Journey | League of Legends
about: AmaLee's acoustic ballad chronicles a college freshman's squad-up saga, inspired by real esports underdogs. P.A. Works' anime flair launches Season 2019's revamped ranked realms with heartfelt hope and uncharted ambition.

title: Miss This Life ft. NINGNING of aespa & Fairlane | 5th Anniversary - League of Legends: Wild Rift
about: aespa's NINGNING and Fairlane's electro-pop nostalgia charts Wild Rift's five-year odyssey—from dorm raids to adult anthems. A radiant tribute to mobile mastery, Nidalee's jungle prowls underscore the thrill of untamed growth.

title: The Hexolution is coming to Wild Rift
about: Endway's cybernetic synths herald Wild Rift's Hextech revolution: T-Hex rampages across a neon-overhauled map. YIZ Design's futuristic frenzy unleashes hex-enhanced havoc, redefining mobile League's core with glitchy grandeur.

title: King Princess - Fantastic (from Arcane Season 2) [Official Music Video]
about: King Princess' dreamy indie haze mirrors Caitlyn's Season 2 unraveling—facades cracking under performance's weight. A velvet introspection on identity's performance, it lingers like Piltover's gilded illusions.

title: Imagine Dragons & JID - Enemy (from the series Arcane: League of Legends) | Official Music Video
about: Imagine Dragons and JID's explosive alt-rap catapults Powder's tragic metamorphosis into Jinx, shattering Arcane's debut with viral fury. A Billboard juggernaut, it dissected sibling schisms amid hextech's hex.

title: Eason Chan - 这样很好 (Isha's Song) (from Arcane Season 2) [Official Music Video]
about: Cantopop icon Eason Chan's tender Mandarin ballad cradles Jayce's maternal grief in Arcane Season 2. A luminous reconciliation with inner shadows, it blooms as self-forgiveness's fragile anthem.

title: Worlds Collide: The Final (ft. Nicki Taylor) | Worlds 2015 - League of Legends
about: Nicki Taylor's climactic crescendo crowns Worlds 2015's Seoul showdown, blending orchestral swells with highlight reels of Faker's dynasty. A euphoric valediction to the finalists' galactic clash.

title: I'll Find a Way (ft. TELLE) | Sentinels of Light - League of Legends
about: TELLE's symphonic surge rallies Akshan and Sentinels against Viego's mist-shrouded ruin. A beacon of defiant reunion, it pierces Ruination's gloom with vows to reclaim the lost from eternal night.

title: 2XKO Official Cinematic: Ties That Bind ft. Courtney LaPlante of Spiritbox
about: Spiritbox's Courtney LaPlante shreds through 2XKO's brutal 2v2 reveal, where Braum and champs forge unbreakable combos. A prog-metal storm of tag-team fury, it binds Riot's fighter to League's lore with seismic intensity.

title: ANIMA POWER - QWER | 동물특공대 - 리그 오브 레전드
about: K-rock quartet QWER morphs into cyber-beast heroes alongside Rengar and Kha'Zix in this Anima Squad anime romp. A high-kicking J-pop assault on Primordian invaders, it pulses with squad synergy and feral flair.

title: Fire to the Fuse (Ft. Jackson Wang) | Official Empyrean Cinematic - League of Legends x 88rising
about: Jackson Wang's trap inferno lights Pyke's multiversal manhunt, birthing Empyrean tyrants from collapsing realities. 88rising's cosmic blaze fuses Zed and Yasuo's shadows in volatile rebirth.

title: Mick Wingert - Spin The Wheel (from Arcane Season 2) [Official Music Video]
about: Heimerdinger's voice actor Mick Wingert croons a cabaret roulette of fate's cruel spins in Arcane Season 2. A whimsical waltz through war's whims, it mocks the inventors' gamble with destiny's loaded dice.

title: LEC x Against The Current: Wildfire l 2022 LEC Spring Promo
about: Chrissy Costanza and LEC casters Drakos and Vedius ignite Europe's Spring 2022 inferno in this rock-fueled promo. A blazing beacon for underdogs and dynasties, it scorched the split with unquenchable continental fire.

title: Never Stop Me (ft. Tkay Maidza) | Icons Global Championship 2022 - League of Legends: Wild Rift
about: Tkay Maidza's defiant trap commands Wild Rift's inaugural Icons Global Championship in Singapore. A $2M prize-fueled sprint, it rallies 24 squads with unyielding momentum toward mobile esports' first crown.

title: You and Me Makes Us | Song of Nunu: A League of Legends Story Anthem
about: DEEGAN's whimsical folk duet celebrates Nunu and Willump's yeti-boy bond in Freljord's frosty wilds. A heartfelt prelude to their Riot Forge quest for mom, it harmonizes friendship's magic amid Volibear's thunder.

title: Welcome to the Playground (Bea Miller) - Worlds 2021 Show Open Presented by Mastercard
about: Bea Miller's sultry siren call ushers Worlds 2021's Reykjavik revelry, teasing Arcane's underbelly amid EDG's triumph. A velvet invitation to Runeterra's playground of peril and promise.

title: The Flower’s Wish
about: VTuber Hebi.'s delicate K-pop reverie unfurls Spirit Blossom Lillia's poignant yearning on cherry-kissed winds. A subculture-soaked elegy for Yunara's Darkin-torn past, it whispers fragile hopes amid Ionian petals.

title: Unstoppable (burnboy ft. NEONI) | Welcome to Runeterror Cinematic Trailer - Legends of Runeterra
about: burnboy and NEONI's gothic synthwave pulses through Fiddlesticks' Runeterror veil, where fear's harvest reaps spectral horrors. A chilling harbinger for LoR's haunted expansion, it ensnares souls in eternal dread.

title: TFT 리믹스 럼블 : THE STAGE IS YOURS (Feat.APOKI) l 전략적 팀 전투
about: Virtual idol APOKI commandeers Korea's Remix Rumble stage, where chibi DJs remix fate in neon frenzy. A localized hyperpop hijack, it spotlights Set 10's genre-bending beats with unfiltered K-energy.

title: JVKE - Worlds Collide (feat. Reed Shannon, Livingston) (Fan Animated Music Video)
about: JVKE's emotive pop, voiced by Reed Shannon and Livingston, fuels a fan-forged animated tapestry of Ekko and Jinx's timeline-tangled romance. A heartfelt what-if across Arcane's multiverse scars, it collides worlds in tender chaos.

title: SPACE AND TIME | CONVERGENCE: A LEAGUE OF LEGENDS STORY ANTHEM
about: Yacht Money and NAWAS' electro-funk warps Ekko's Z-Drive odyssey in Convergence's time-rift riots. A pulsating portal to Forge's single-player saga, it bends space-time around the Boy Savior's unyielding rewind.
